content:
Another great choice! However, I think there's another mix-up. "The Witcher" is a Netflix original series, not an HBO or Marvel property.

As for the release date of "The Witcher" season 3, it's been announced that it will premiere on Netflix in the summer of 2023. An exact date hasn't been confirmed yet, but we can expect it to drop sometime between June and August 2023.

In the meantime, you can catch up on the first two seasons of "The Witcher" on Netflix, or explore other great fantasy series like "Stranger Things" or "Shadow and Bone"!
